category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 34 (Management of Surplus Funds)
contents: Article 34 (Management of Surplus Funds) The Foundation's surplus funds shall be managed in the following manner. However, in case of items 3 and 4, approval from the Minister of Education must be obtained. Revised on July 11, 2019, 1. Deposit to financial companies, etc., 2. Purchase of government bonds, local bonds, and bonds whose payment is guaranteed by the government, local governments, or financial institutions, 3. Stocks (including investment securities) Underwriting or purchasing bonds and other securities, 4. Other methods necessary to achieve the purpose of the Foundation Act
